subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Birkhead Says Test Shows He Fathered Anna Nicole's Baby
body:
Anna Nicole Smith's former boyfriend Larry Birkhead says DNA has proven he 
is the father of her infant daughter.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
